trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Rensselaer
There were no other sightings in Rensselaer on or around June 30th 1976
Summary: Had close encounter with red orb the size of a basketball.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Details"Narrative below was submitted by MUFON Dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness." Back in 1976, a friend took me to a place that "orbs" were being seen. We drove to the area and I sat on the hood of the car. We sat real still. We saw about four of them, but one came up a few inches from my face. It was a big as a basketball and the color red. My friend honked his car horn and the object "winked out." They changed colors. I can show someone where the exact location was.
